snippet.title: THE ARTFUL ESCAPE | Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
The Artful Escape is coming to Xbox Game Pass, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and Steam on September 9. Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1122680/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=072921&utm_medium=directreach

A teenage guitar prodigy sets out on a psychedelic, multidimensional journey to inspire his stage persona and confront the legacy of a dead folk legend. Starring voice performances by Michael Johnston, Caroline Kinley, Lena Headey, Jason Schwartzman, Mark Strong, and Carl Weathers. 

Developed by BEETHOVEN & DINOSAUR. Published by Annapurna Interactive.

© Annapurna Interactive, 2021
